subject: Re: Order #SSN5637 confirmed
description_text:
Hi, I ordered a shifter last Thursday and haven’t received a shipping email or anything. It said 3-7 days for delivery but it’s been 5 days and worried it hasn’t even left the warehouse yet. Any info would be appreciated. Thank you Sent from my iPhone On Jan 1, 2026, at 5:13 PM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿

conversations.body_text: Hi Logan Miller,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.
